channel.title: Autospawn problem
channel.description: ScapeRune Server. Original source: DeltaScape Extra Features Coded brandon Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 8 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1967) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:548) at server.main(server.java:111) how do i fix this problem

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

Sorry, I’ve never really edited any of that.

Read full topic

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @kampeao kampeao
item.description:
@kampeao wrote:

Umm…so the only way to open a shop with a npc is if he has the trade option or add the option…
cuz i tried to make a shop right now with the npc 381 ( captain barnaby) and the only option he has was the option “talk” and nothing happens…
ok,thanks

Read full topic

uhmmm you’d have to add the trade option somewhere in all your files but idk where

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @kampeao kampeao
item.description:
@kampeao wrote:

No,i didn’t…it’s one of those things i’l never understand…eh,whatever…
btw,i got another problem…i have some shops open, like one with the npc miles and one with vannaka…
The one with miles works fine,but the shop with vannaka doesnt open when i click trade with him…
what’s wrong?can anybody tell?
Edit:nevermind, i can acess the shop with the option “talk to” and then choose the option “do you have anything for trade”,but why doesnt the option “trade” work? i used to play in another server and the option “trade” didnt work either

Read full topic

item.title: Autospawn problem

item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

You probably accidentally spaced somewhere.

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @kampeao kampeao
item.description:
@kampeao wrote:

Ok…i’m lost…
Anyway,my problem is fixed
It was this spawn:

spawn = 2621	2954	3375	0	0	0	0	1

I don’t know what the problem is or was, but now is fixed…can you tell me what was the problem about this?
In my npc.cfg it says it’s TzHaar-Hur-Koz
wha’s the problem? it wasn’t spawned in any other place…only here…whats wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

We’re talking about 2 different files though… what the npc drops is in npcdrops.cfg… where it spawns and all that is in autospawn.cfg.

Read full topic

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @kampeao kampeao
item.description:
@kampeao wrote:

But in normal runescape there are monsters that drop,let’s say…staff of air, and in varrock staff shop,you can buy them… everything works fine there…maybe private serves work differently

Read full topic

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

w/e npc you last edited search the id… and yes monsters are npc’s but monsters are different from like the shop guys… it you add the same item the monster drops already you will get errors… well i did

Read full topic

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @kampeao kampeao
item.description:
@kampeao wrote:

Umm…i just fixed my problem…i deleted all the spawn from the spawn.cfg…now i’m alone,nor monster nor npc’s xD.
I don’t think it’s the spaces,i always use tabs(but who knows,maybe i pressed space at some point)
There should be a program that fixes this small things like the spaces…
Anyway,il try to see if i spawned 2 of the same npc in my backup files…
btw, i though you/we could spawn more than 1 of the same npc,like 2 hellhounds,but maybe not…just same monsters,not npc… o.O
And…i think there should be no problem in having more than 1 monster/npc(are monsters npc too?) dropping the same item…in normal runescape many monsters drop the same thing…
Edit: omg…i have 430 spawns…it will take forever to see if a npc was spawned twice,what do i do?
Alright,thanks…i’l try that…
Edit2:I’m almost done…i saved a copy of the original autospawn.cfg,just in case;im deleting the spawns at 100 spawns each time and seeing in which piece of spawns(like,from 300 to 400) is the error.
Il keep in touch…

Read full topic

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @jake_cake jake cake
item.description:
@jake_cake wrote:

ahh, i just got this prob today… I found out, idk if this is your problem, but i found out what i was doing is i was adding drops in npcdrops and i added certain items and i found out that the certain monster already dropped that item… so your problem probly is you added a npc that was already spawned before… search the npc id in autospawn.cfg and if you find 2 or more, delete them. Hope this helps!

Read full topic

item.title: Autospawn problem
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

means you used the space key rather than the tab key.

Read full topic
